page.title: 15ORGANIZED LEISURE 2
page.content: The Roller Boot Disco is held at Hampden Park Sports Centre in Broderick Road every Sunday from 6-00pm until 7-15 if you hire boots, but if you have your own you can carry on until 7-30.It costs 90p to get in and 50p to hire boots. As well as doing dancing they have games.One of the games British Bulldog which is a game where you have some people who are "it" and they have to chase and catch you by lifting you off the ground and shouting "British Bulldog 1,2,3." Eighty or more people go to the roller disco.{ {By Gary Sheppard Age 10 { {
